creator: mettu.kumar@redspark.com
text:
org.apache.catalina.connector.http.HTTPConnector has following lines of code:
    /**
     * The maximum number of processors allowed, or <0 for unlimited.
     */
    private int maxProcessors = 20;

Which gives an impression if maxProcessors  is set to a -ve value in server.xml 
unlimited option is used. But this is not implemented.  Infact there is no code 
which check if maxProcessors  is set to -ve value a create unlimited processors.

A way to test this is set minProcessors="0" maxProcessors="-1". You will notice 
that server is not responding for request.
